Documentation.content: Extract the beta values form the model dataset.
Documentation.return: the beta values with confidence intervals term.
Documentation.param: level the significance value for the intervals

Documentation.content: Extract the beta values form the model dataset.
Documentation.return: a beta values as Model Coefficient records, zero as the constant term.

Documentation.content: Cumulative Distribution of the standard normal distribution, the probability that a normal random variable will be smaller than x standard deviations above or below the mean. Taken from C/C++ Mathematical Algorithms for Scientists and Engineers, n. Shammas, McGraw-Hill, 1995
Documentation.param: x the number of standard deviations

Documentation.content: Normal Distribution Percentage Point Function. Translated from C/C++ Mathematical Algorithms for Scientists and Engineers, N. Shammas, McGraw-Hill, 1995
Documentation.returns: number of standard deviations from the mean

Documentation.content: Students t distribution integral evaluated between negative infinity and x. Translated from NIST SEL DATAPAC Fortran TCDF.f source
Documentation.returns: the probability that a value will be less than the specified value

Documentation.content: Percentage point function for the T distribution. Translated from NIST SEL DATAPAC Fortran TPPF.f source
The cumulative distribution function for the Chi Square distribution. the CDF for the specfied degrees of freedom. Translated from the NIST SEL DATAPAC Fortran subroutine CHSCDF.
The Chi Squared PPF function. Translated from the NIST SEL DATAPAC Fortran subroutine CHSPPF.

The 'double' factorial is defined for ODD n and is the product of all the odd numbers up to and including that number. We are extending the meaning to even numbers to mean the product of the even numbers up to and including that number. Thus DoubleFac(8) = 8*6*4*2 We also defend against i < 2 (returning 1.0)
Documentation.return: the factorial of the sequence, declining by 2
Documentation.param: i the value used in the calculation
